results.title: A Case of Post-COVID-19 Subacute Thyroiditis
results.text_hl: An endocrinologist was taken on board, a clinical diagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Thyroiditis_Subacute</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013968 @@@subacute thyroiditis@@@ was made, and the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was discharged home on oral @CHEMICAL_Prednisone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011241 @@@prednisone@@@ (20 mg) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (25 mg) daily.

citations.NLM: Mehmood MA, Bapna M, Arshad M. A Case of Post-COVID-19 Subacute Thyroiditis Cureus. 2020 Dec 26;12(12):e12301. PMID: 33510992
